channel.title: Cleanup
channel.description:
Just wondering if there is a time limit I should be aware of before cleaning up some of the server.
There's a lot of blocks placed in random places, half chopped trees, 2x2 shelters, etc. So far I'm only removing the "damage" done by banned members, but there are some structures that were created > 600 hours ago, by members who aren't banned.
Should I go ahead and clean those up to, or leave them?

item.title: Cleanup
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I would also like to know this as there are a few houses and things that you can’t even call a “Build” that I would like to remove that are quite and eye sore. Also, what about the chests of those people who are banned and/or haven’t played for a while?

Read full topic
